name: Bands That Only Exist In Movies! Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: What's the name of the band formed by Chazz (Brendan Fraser), Rex (Steve Buscemi), and Pip (Adam Sandler) in 1994's 'Airheads'?
questions.explanation:
The Lone Rangers.

	It's pointed out that since there are three of them, they're not exactly 'lone.'

questions.text: At the beginning of 1985's 'Back To the Future,' we see Marty McFly's band auditioning for a gig at their high school. What is this band's name?
questions.explanation:
The Pinheads.

	Marty (Michael J. Fox) states the band's name just before ripping into a heavy version of the movie's theme song: Huey Lewis and the News' 'The Power Of Love.' The geeky-looking man with the bullhorn who rejects The Pinheads almost immediately is, of course, played by Huey Lewis himself.

questions.text: And while we're on the subject of Michael J. Fox, in 1987's 'Light Of Day,' Fox portrays a young man in a band with his sister (Joan Jett). What is this band called?
questions.explanation:
The Barbusters.

	Fiction bled over into reality a bit when The Barbusters' version of the Bruce Springteen-written 'Light Of Day' was released as a single and hit the charts.

questions.text: Michael J. Fox isn't the only 'Family Ties' cast member to star in a movie about a band -- Justine Bateman starred as the leader of an all-female band in 1988's 'Satisfaction.' What was this band's name?
questions.explanation:
Mystery.

	And yes, the rumors are true -- that IS Julia Roberts playing second fiddle to 'Mallory' from 'Family Ties.' Funny how times change.

questions.text: In 1989's 'The Big Picture,' aspiring film director Nick Chapman (Kevin Bacon) directs a bizarre but inventive video featuring a band led by his friend Lydia (Jennifer Jason Leigh). What is this band called?
questions.explanation:
Pez People.

	The quirky video gets Nick noticed by a Hollywood studio.

questions.text: In 1984's 'Streets of Fire,' Diane Lane plays Ellen Aim, a rock and roll superstar. What's the name of the band that ably backs her (dubbed-in) power vocals?
questions.explanation:
The Attackers.

	We see posters on walls throughout the movie advertising 'Ellen Aim and The Attackers.'

questions.text: In 1995's 'Empire Records,' slightly-addled music store clerk Mark (Ethan Embry) expresses a desire to start a band. What name does he think this band will have?
questions.explanation:
Marc.

	Mark: 'I think I'd call it 'Marc'...but with a 'C,' you know? Since my name is with a 'K'?'

questions.text: At one point in 1996's 'That Thing You Do!', the fictional band known as The Wonders lands a cameo in a beach movie, playing dead instruments and wearing sailor suits. Finish the name of the band they portray: 'Cap'n Geech and the _____________.'
questions.explanation:
Shrimp Shack Shooters.

	The Wonders are informed by their manager (Tom Hanks) that they get to keep their 'Cap'n Geech' costumes. =)

questions.text: In 1980's 'The Blues Brothers,' Jake and Elwood Blues set out to track down every member of their former band. They find several of these men all at once, performing in a rather cheesy, velvet-clad band led by real-life blues keyboardist Murphy Dunne. Finish the name of the band they have formed in Jake and Elwood's absence: 'Murph and the __________.'
questions.explanation:
MagicTones & Magic Tones & Magic-Tones.

	It doesn't take much persuasion from Jake and Elwood to get the MagicTones to pack in their hotel bar act and re-assemble the Blues Brothers Band.

questions.text: At the end of 2000's 'High Fidelity,' Rob Gordon (John Cusack) reluctantly introduces Sonic Death Monkey, a band led by his obnoxious employee Barry (Jack Black). Barry quickly points out that the band no longer goes by that name. Their new name is unprintable in this medium, but Barry mentions that the band members briefly considered an interim band name that invoked the name of a famous actress. In which of the following movies would you find this actress?
questions.explanation:
'Body Heat'.

	Barry: 'We briefly considered calling ourselves 'Kathleen Turner Overdrive'.'
